name: Kanye's Backrooms
description:
Kanye's Backrooms is a 3d puzzle/platformer game where you utilize glitches to complete the 4 various levels. It is inspired by games such as Grey-Box Testing, Portal, and Mirror's Edge. 

Controls:

 - ESC to open the menu

 - WASD + Mouse to look around and move

 - LSHIFT to crouch

 - TAB to quick restart a level

 - C to toggle field of view

This project was made as my 10-week college FMP and will likely not be expanded upon after it's all finished.
